name: Phoenix
headline: Canada's digital health clinic for men
description: Phoenix is a mission-driven digital healthcare platform for men. We are dedicated to improving the relationship men have with their health, while building the future of patient-centric healthcare in Canada from diagnosing to delivery.

founders.name: Gavin Thompson, Founder
founders.description: Gavin Thompson is a senior software developer with an entrepreneurial streak. Gavin has worked for some of Canada‚Äôs top tech companies including MetaLab, TouchBistro, and Apply Digital among them. In addition to working for some of Canada‚Äôs top-tech he has also developed products for Fortune 500‚Äôs such as Walmart, and Disney.

founders.name: Kevin Bache, Founder
founders.description:
CEO with a deep passion for product innovation and growth hacking. Over a decade of expertise in software development, design, digital health, and pharmaceutical advertising.

I cofounded Phoenix because I was frustrated with the state of healthcare delivery in Canada.

# Erectile Dysfunction
** _Power Up Your Performance Against ED_**
Erectile dysfunction (ED) is the inability to achieve or maintain an erection sufficient for sexual activity due to reduced blood flow to the penis. Thankfully ED can be easily treated with doctor-prescribed medication. Phoenix provides a simple, discreet digital platform for connecting with licensed Canadian physicians that can help treat your ED from the comfort of your home.
Benefits of our treatment
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6279483c9fbc834de3c7d7ad/6279483c9fbc83801bc7d83e_check_circle_outline2.svg)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6279483c9fbc834de3c7d7ad/6279483c9fbc83801bc7d83e_check_circle_outline2.svg)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6279483c9fbc834de3c7d7ad/6279483c9fbc83801bc7d83e_check_circle_outline2.svg)
Ongoing Treatment
[Start Your Treatment](https://phoenix.ca/<https:/app.phoenix.ca/screening/ed/new>)

## A few easy steps to Better Health
![phone will medical quiz](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6279483c9fbc834de3c7d7ad/66020d668dff0b0cb96e14fb_Group%2011.png)
1. Online Visit
Describe your symptoms to a licensed Canadian physician using our simple, secure online form.
![pill bottle and pill packs](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6279483c9fbc834de3c7d7ad/66020d668b948a5227c6c190_Group%2013.png)
2. Free Delivery
Choose a treatment option and have it discreetly sent to your door with free two-day shipping.
![pill bottle and pill packs](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6279483c9fbc834de3c7d7ad/66020e2896780a14617b2d25_Group%2014.png)
3. Follow-Up Care
Message your physician any time with follow-up questions, concerns or questions regarding your treatment plan.
![man using ipad](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6279483c9fbc834de3c7d7ad/6279483c9fbc834303c7d873_pexels-cottonbro-4065152%201.jpg)
## Straightforward treatment
Skip clinic wait times and avoid awkward face-to-face conversations. Discuss treatment options and schedule delivery from the comfort of your own home.**It‚Äôs time to Rise Again.**
[Get Started](https://phoenix.ca/<https:/app.phoenix.ca/screening/new>)

Personalized Care
Have a licensed Canadian physician assess your symptoms and medical history using our simple, secure online form.
![phone with doctor chat on screen](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6279483c9fbc834de3c7d7ad/66020e2896780a14617b2d25_Group%2014.png)
Ongoing Treatment
Keep the same physician over the course of your treatment. Message them any time with follow-up questions, concerns or questions regarding your treatment plan.
## See why we are trustedacross Canada!
Whether it's hair loss or erectile dysfunction, Phoenix has licensed Canadian physicians standing by to assess and prescribe treatment options that we then ship directly to your door. What are you waiting for?‍**See why so many Canadian men have chosen to Rise Again with Phoenix.**

## Everything you should knowabout Men's health
[![Battling hair loss can make you desperate. You might have tried all the internet tips to no avail. Luckily, there are both over-the-counter and prescription options available that have been clinically proven to deliver results. The two leading FDA-approved medications for hair loss are finasteride and minoxidil. Some men see wondrous results with a combination while others only need one. It depends on your needs. We know how much of an impact hair loss has on your self-confidence. To make finding the right treatment easier, we‚Äôve compiled this guide that compares finasteride and minoxidil in terms of effectiveness, side effects, and results. ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6279483c9fbc838c54c7d7b0/65a98afb5eefd6dd0f63b430_DSC00658-Enhanced-NR.jpg)](https://phoenix.ca/</blog/finasteride-vs-minoxidil-knowing-the-difference>)
## Finasteride vs. Minoxidil: Knowing the Difference
Read time - 
8
min
[![Viagra and Cialis are two of the most popular medications for treating erectile dysfunction \(ED\), but how do you know which one is right for you? Some men aren‚Äôt worried about what‚Äôs written on their prescription, they just want a pill that works. We get you, but hear us out: the meds you take make a difference, and they have important potential side effects to know about. We want you to find the right solution for your ED, but we want it to be more than a quick fix. That‚Äôs why we‚Äôre delving into the details behind Viagra vs. Cialis, so you can truly understand what each medication does and how it may impact your health. Let‚Äôs get started with the basics.
](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6279483c9fbc838c54c7d7b0/6585bfab766153dd69726c7f_Viagra%20vs%20Cialis.jpg)](https://phoenix.ca/</blog/viagra-vs-cialis-know-the-difference>)
## Viagra vs. Cialis: Knowing the Difference
Read time - 
8
min
[![Anyone going through hair loss will tell you, it didn‚Äôt happen overnight. Although hair loss is a natural part of aging, one of the most prevalent forms of hair loss in men is male pattern baldness, scientifically referred to as androgenetic alopecia. There is a distinct pattern and progression to this type of hair loss. The Norwood Scale is most used to understand and define this balding progression.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6279483c9fbc838c54c7d7b0/654be54844b510c07833727c_Blog%20Post%20via%20Draft%20\(1\).png)](https://phoenix.ca/</blog/the-7-stages-of-hair-loss>)

# Erectile Dysfunction
** _Power Up Your Performance Against ED_**
Erectile dysfunction (ED) is the inability to achieve or maintain an erection sufficient for sexual activity due to reduced blood flow to the penis. Thankfully ED can be easily treated with doctor-prescribed medication. Phoenix provides a simple, discreet digital platform for connecting with licensed Canadian physicians that can help treat your ED from the comfort of your home.

generated_description:
### Company Summary: Phoenix

**Overview**:  
Phoenix is a pioneering digital health clinic based in Toronto, Canada, specifically catering to men's health. Founded in 2019 and part of the Y Combinator Batch W21, Phoenix is aimed at redefining how men engage with their health, employing a mission-driven approach to provide diagnostic and treatment services through a patient-centric platform. Their focus is on overcoming traditional barriers to men‚Äôs health, prioritizing convenience and accessibility.

**Mission**:  
To improve men's health and their relationship with it, creating a more supportive structure for health management that emphasizes patient-centric care.

**Services Offered**:  
Phoenix provides a range of treatments, primarily through a hassle-free online platform:
- **Erectile Dysfunction**: Medical advice and treatments like Sildenafil and Tadalafil, with discreet delivery.
- **Hair Loss**: Consultation and treatment options tailored to individual needs.
- **Premature Ejaculation**: Advanced medication designed to enhance control during intimacy.
- **Weight Loss**: Medical guidance using innovative GLP-1 medications to aid in weight management.

Each treatment is facilitated through licensed Canadian physicians, ensuring professional consultation, support, and ongoing care, all from the comfort of home. They prominently feature a straightforward three-step process: online consultation, discreet delivery, and follow-up care.

**Team & Structure**:  
The Phoenix team consists of around 20 employees, committed to providing top-notch service and medical support. Aaron Epstein serves as their Group Partner.

**Tagline**:  
"Canada‚Äôs Digital Health Clinic for Men."

**Location**:  
Headquartered in Toronto, with services extending across Canada, including Vancouver, Calgary, Edmonton, Ottawa, and Halifax.

**Unique Value Proposition**:  
Phoenix aims to demystify men's health issues by offering direct access to healthcare solutions that are both discreet and efficient. The platform allows for real-time communication with healthcare providers, creating a personalized experience based on individual health needs.

For more information, services, or to start a consultation, visit their website: [Phoenix](https://phoenix.ca) and start your journey toward better health today.
